articles.title: Senate advances bill to boost Social Security benefits for millions of people - The Hill
articles.description: The Senate voted overwhelmingly Thursday to advance a bill to boost Social Security benefits for more than 2 million Americans by repealing two laws that have limited payouts to state and local public-sector workers and their families. It advanced by a vote o…
